title: NFL Draft 2021: Giants will pass on elite WR, who lands with Eagles, insider predicts | Trey Lance, Justin Field shockers
body: NFL Network's Charley Casserly predicts the Philadelphia Eagles will draft Alabama wide receiver Jaylen Waddle.The  and  both entered the offseason needing upgrades at wide receiver.The Giants have taken care of that, signingand.The Eagles have not, and hope to land one of the elite receivers in the  when the pick at No. 12 overall.is out with his latest mock draft. He predicts the Giants will resist the temptation to pair Golladay with one of this year’s top wideouts, which will make the Eagles quite happy.Casserly predicts LSU wide receiver  will go to the at No. 6 and Alabama’s  will go to the at No. 7.Casserly also thinks North Dakota State’s  will fall to the at No. 14 and Ohio State’s  will remain on the board until the are on the clock at No. 24.
